column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ iyinom ekyir no
column3: Egypthen ne nsahyɛfo nye ne paanootofo no foom hɔn wura Egypthen no."

column2: "Na Farao no bo fuuw n’asomfo beenu no
column3: nsahyɛfo panyin no

column2: "Na ɔdze hɔn koguu efiadze wɔ abrafohen no ne fie
column3: wɔ efiadze beebi mbrɛ Josef da no no mu."

column2: "Na abrafohen no dze hɔn hyɛɛ Josef ne nsa
column3: na ɔsoom hɔn: na wɔkyɛɛr efiadze hɔ mber kakra."

column2: "Na hɔn beenu nyina sosoo daa
column3: anafua da kor a ɔsor obiara ne daa

column2: "Na Josef baa hɔn nkyɛn anapa no
column3: obohun hɔn dɛ wɔabombɔm."

column2: "Na obisaa Farao n’asomfo a wɔnye no gu efiadze hɔ no dɛ
column3: ɔyɛ dɛn na ndɛ hom abombɔm dɛm yi?"

column2: "Na wɔsee no dɛ
column3: Yɛasoso daa
column4: naaso yennya obi ma ɔnnkyerɛ hɛn ase. Na Josef see hɔn dɛ
column5: Ana nnyɛ Nyankopɔn na ɔma nkyerɛase bi a? Meserɛ hom

column2: "Na nsahyɛfo panyin no kaa n’adaaso kyerɛɛ Josef
column3: na ɔsee no dɛ

column2: "na nkorbata ebiasa wɔ wenyindua no ho: na ɔyɛ dɛ ɔafefɛw
column3: na ɔabɔ nhyiren; na no do nsiansiaw asow wenyinamba a ɔaber:"

column2: "na Farao no kɔɔpow kitsa me nsamu
column3: na metsetseew wenyinamba no
column4: na mikyii guu Farao no kɔɔpow mu
column5: na medze kɔɔpow no hyɛɛ Farao ne nsa."

column2: "Na Josef see no dɛ
column3: Ne nkyerɛase nye yi; nkorbata ebiasa no ɔyɛ ndaansa."

column2: "Aka ndaansa ma Farao eyi wo efi ha na ɔama ekedzi wo dzibew bio: na edze Farao no kɔɔpow bɛhyɛ ne nsa
column3: dɛ nkyɛ kan no a eyɛ ne nsahyɛfo no."

column2: "Na sɛ inya beebi si a
column3: ɔno kaa me
column6: na bɔ me dzin kyerɛ Farao
column7: na beyi me fi dan yi mu:"

column2: "na owia na wowiaa me wɔ Hebriwfo asaase do: na ha so mennyɛɛ biribiara a ɔsɛ dɛ wɔdze me to efiadze."
"Na aber a paanootofo panyin no hun dɛ nkyerɛase no ye no
column3: ɔsee Josef dɛ
column5: muhun dɛ paanoo fufuw nkɛntsɛn ebiasa sisi m’etsifi:"

column2: "na kɛntsɛn a odzi sor no adɔkɔdɔkɔdze a wɔto ma Farao nyinara bi wɔ mu; na nnoma ridzi no kɛntsɛn no mu wɔ m’etsifi."
"Na Josef buae na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Ne nkyerɛase nye yi: nkɛntsɛn ebiasa no yɛ ndaansa:"

column2: "na aka ndaansa ma Farao eyi wo tsir wɔ wo do
column3: na wɔasɛn wo wɔ dua do ma nnoma edzi wo nam efi wo ho."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ ne ndaansa no a ɔyɛ Farao n’awoda no
column3: ɔtoo pon maa no nkowaa nyinara: na oyii nsahyɛfo panyin no nye paanootofo panyin no fii efiadze dze hɔn baa no nkowaa no enyim."

column2: "Na ɔmaa nsahyɛfo panyin no sanee yɛɛ ne nsahyɛdwuma no bio; na ɔdze kɔɔpow no hyɛɛ Farao ne nsa:"
"na paanootofo panyin no dze
column3: ɔsɛɛn no: dɛ mbrɛ Josef kyerɛɛ hɔn ase no ara."

column2: "Naaso nsahyɛfo panyin no annkaa Josef
column3: na no werɛ fiir no."
